summary: A backwoods lawyer's race for the governor's office is thwarted by mainstream opponents who dig up dirt from his past.
cast: Herb Shriner|Barbara Hale|Bobby Clark|Paul Harvey|Rita Lynn|Arthur Q. Bryan|Hayden Rorke|Claud Allister|William Forrest|Oliver Cliff|Bill Baldwin|John Breen|Charles Evans|James Flavin|Creighton Hale|John Hamilton|Ruth Lee|Jack McCoy|Mathew McCue|Matt Moore|Joe Ploski
title: Meet the Governor
